org.openimaj.image.processing.algorithm

Class GammaCorrection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.processing.algorithm.GammaCorrection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PixelProcessor<Float>

    public class GammaCorrection
extends Object
implements PixelProcessor<Float>
    Class to perform Gamma correction on a grey-level image. Grey levels are transformed such that I_new = I^Gamma for Gamma > 0 and all pixels I. If Gamma == 0 then the transform is I_new = log(I).
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
